Rest: Getting plenty of rest can help your body fight off the infection and recover faster.
Humidifiers: Using a humidifier can help add moisture to the air, which can make it easier to breathe and help soothe a sore throat.
Over-the-counter pain relievers: While not a cure, over-the-counter pain relievers like acetaminophen or ibuprofen can help alleviate symptoms like fever and body aches.
Saline nasal sprays: Using a saline nasal spray can help loosen and flush out mucus, making it easier to breathe.
Steam inhalation: Inhaling steam from a hot shower or bath can help relieve congestion and soothe a sore throat.
